alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:28AM CDT until March 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 327 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Denson, or near Lanett, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lanett, Lakeview, Amity Park, Fredonia, Veasey Creek Park, Denson, Huguley, I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett and Southern Harbor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
